name: The Oberoi Grand
description: A luxurious heritage hotel in the heart of Kolkata, offering timeless elegance and impeccable service.

name: Taj Falaknuma Palace
description: Experience the life of Nizams at this opulent palace hotel, featuring grand architecture and stunning city views.

name: Lemon Tree Premier
description: A vibrant and contemporary hotel located close to major attractions, known for its fresh and zesty interiors.

name: Radisson Blu
description: Nestled near the Cavelossim Beach, this resort offers a perfect blend of comfort and Goan hospitality.

name: Ginger Hotel
description: A smart and affordable hotel in the bustling city of Mumbai, designed for the modern traveller.

name: ITC Maurya
description: A landmark hotel in the diplomatic enclave, known for its legendary hospitality and culinary excellence.

name: The Leela Palace
description: A modern palace hotel by the sea, offering breathtaking views and luxurious accommodations.

name: Trident
description: Located at Nariman Point, this hotel offers stunning views of the Arabian Sea and the city skyline.

name: Hyatt Regency
description: A premier business hotel with world-class amenities and a serene ambiance, located near the city center.

name: The Park
description: A contemporary luxury hotel overlooking the picturesque Hussain Sagar Lake.

name: Fern Residency
description: An environmentally sensitive hotel providing a comfortable and convenient stay.

name: Zuri White Sands
description: A sprawling resort on the pristine Varca beach with a large casino and extensive gardens.
